mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Clarifies legal issues surrounding the title to the land the Short sold to David Higginbotham; mentions the likelihood of establishing the state university in Albemarle; says the school will produce a "collection of literary characters" that "will greatly improve the state of our society."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1817 October 14, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to [William] Short, n.p.
